name: Time Wrap
description:
Time – that thing we seem to have so much of
Yet so little is used with care
And when that time ends
The time of regret begins

A short, minimalist, puzzle platformer in which you must beat each level in under 15 seconds. Includes:

  • red diamonds that kill you,
  • squares that change gravity,
  • squares that make you bounce,
  • and squares that teleport you

NOTE: game must be played in a 640x480 res., otherwise it won't work properly.
